title: The Book of Revelation - 2006 - Multisub
description:
TITLE: The Book Of Revelation
YEAR: 2006

Australian film directed by Ana Kokkinos, from the novel by Rupert Thomson. An erotic mystery about power and sex, the entanglement of victim and perpetrator, and a man's struggle to regain his lost self.
Daniel (Tom Long), a charismatic dancer, is drugged and abducted in an alley by three hooded women. They proceed to torture and rape him in an abandoned warehouse for about two weeks, before they take him in their car and dump him out. When he is left to return to his normal life, he loses his ability to dance and has problems relating with his environment. To reclaim his identity, he seeks revenge. He does so by hitting on every woman who responds to him hoping his abductors would be among them.

Reviews:
The Observer: This walks a thin line between pornography and seriousness as unsteadily as an inebriate trying to appear sober.
The Guardian: A psychologically intriguing film, which never quite adds up dramatically.
BBCi Films: A lush, hypnotic waking dream.
